mapper.sql: id, `name`, frame_code, frame_address, frame_gis_x, frame_gis_y, frame_status, descrip_infos, create_time, update_time, extends1, extends2, extends3
mapper.insert: insert into frame_management (id, `name`, frame_code, frame_address, frame_gis_x, frame_gis_y, frame_status, descrip_infos, create_time, update_time, extends1, extends2, extends3) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameGisX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameGisY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descripInfos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update frame_management set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_code = #{frameCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_address = #{frameAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_gis_x = #{frameGisX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_gis_y = #{frameGisY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_status = #{frameStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descrip_infos = #{descripInfos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, extends1 = #{extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends2 = #{extends2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends3 = #{extends3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, frame_code, frame_address, frame_gis_x, frame_gis_y, frame_status, descrip_infos, create_time, update_time, extends1, extends2, extends3 from frame_management where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, `name`, frame_code, frame_address, frame_gis_x, frame_gis_y, frame_status, descrip_infos, create_time, update_time, extends1, extends2, extends3 from frame_management

select id, `name`, frame_code, frame_address, frame_gis_x, frame_gis_y, frame_status, descrip_infos, create_time, update_time, extends1, extends2, extends3 from frame_management a where a.`name` LIKE '%${serchnameParam}%' AND a.frame_code LIKE '%${searchNoParam}%' AND a.frame_status LIKE '%${serchStatusParam}%'

select count(*) from frame_management where 1=1
and name like "%"#{serchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and frame_code like "%"#{searchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and frame_status = #{serchStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from frame_management
where 1=1
and name like "%"#{serchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and frame_code like "%"#{searchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and frame_status = #{serchStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
limit #{limitStar,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=BIGINT}
